challenges.label: GAP
challenges.title: $170B Annual Shortfall
challenges.description: India needs $223B/year for NDC commitments; current flows are ~$49B annually. 76% gap remains unfunded.

challenges.label: CHALLENGE
challenges.title: Adaptation Underfunded
challenges.description: Only 6% of climate finance goes to adaptation. Mitigation receives 94% despite equal urgency.

challenges.label: CHALLENGE
challenges.title: Domestic Capital Constraints
challenges.description: Banks face asset-liability mismatch for 20-year climate projects. Green bond market nascent at $20B.

challenges.label: OPPORTUNITY
challenges.title: Blended Finance Models
challenges.description: First-loss capital from philanthropy can de-risk commercial investment. 1:4 to 1:8 leverage ratios possible.
